Title: Why Jay Shitslee should go to hell
Body: Look. I'm not a crazy argo-fascist repiblican like some of the people that agree  with me. In fact I am the chairperson of the green party of Washington, the ONLY party that truly advocates for the enviornement. As such, it is my job to call out petro-dictator shitslee when he messes up. It's true that shitslee does in fact lobby to big oil, as well as to big GAS, but this doesnt stop gim from virtue signaling! Just think about it, banning non electric cars? the man is in the pocket of big elon! this is outrageous! #banallcars, #bulldozetheroads
